Package net.TheDgtl.Stargate.gate

Class GateFormatHandler

java.lang.Object
net.TheDgtl.Stargate.gate.GateFormatHandler
public class GateFormatHandler extends Object
A handler that keeps track of all known gate formats

      The folder to load gates from

      Returns:
